text: Lafayette Ronald Hubbard (March 13, 1911 â€“ January 24, 1986) was the founder of Dianetics and Scientology.http://www.scientology.org/l-ron-hubbard.html He started as a pulp fiction and science fiction writer. Hubbard was born in Tilden, Nebraska to Harry Ross Hubbard and Ledora May Hubbard. He died of a stroke in Creston, California. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Scientologists Category:Writers from Nebraska
title: L. Ron Hubbard
